admin.add_items_price: ğŸ’µ Please enter the price in {currency_text} or "cancel": Example: 50.0
admin.add_items_private_data: â„¹ï¸ Please send the data the user will receive after purchase. Note: If you enter one line, one product is added; if you enter multiple lines, multiple products are added. 1 line = 1 item 10 lines = 10 items. If you want to cancel adding items, enter "cancel".
